website_summaries.verdict: A classy high-end glassware set, perfect for gifts and special occasions.
pros: Intricate handcrafted design with a gold-plated base effortlessly adds a touch of elegance to any occasion
Consists of hard, quality glass that's resistant to chipping and breakage
As a gift, this uniquely luxurious glassware set stands head and shoulders above the rest
cons: Not a practical option for everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses, wash them by hand if you want them to last!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Palacio

customer_reviews.title: i love these! i drink wine
customer_reviews.text: i love these! i drink wine, water, beer, etc. out of them. i've even purchased them a housewarming gift for a friend and she loves them too. highly recommend this cute set. also, it says that they are not dishwasher safe, but i've cleaned them multiple times that way and they've been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Seeling

customer_reviews.title: Ritzy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: This was an Amazon suggestive gift idea. So I bought it for my daughter for this Xmas. I will just store it. But I am grateful that they arrived in perfect condition and look so lovely. I know she will enjoy serving beverages in these gold embossed glasses. Very elegant looking I must add.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Very special design and looks great. Love the golden decoration
customer_reviews.text: well packed. Very special design and looks great. Love the golden decoration , good for coming holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Katee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift
customer_reviews.text: These glasses give an elegant touch to my kitchen and my friends have said they are beautiful, it's perfect for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar E. Nunes Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: To expensive, found them cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love these glass so much I want the whole line, then I found them at Walmart.com 2x less than what paid on Amazon. I’m very disappointed. But the quality and look is divine.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: These were great and match my gold foil planters I already had
customer_reviews.text: These were great and match my gold foil planters I already had. Glasses are well packaged. Great for my next wine party!
customer_reviews.author: picky with my purchases

customer_reviews.title: Must-have!
customer_reviews.text: This drinkware set are stunning and beautiful! Highly recommend these for cold beverages that you want to have a little elegance with even if you are in pajamas and jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Dong

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite disappointed with the purchase. There are small bubbles in the glass, the gold chips are bright gold and looks cheap. However the glasses came in a nice box, intact and was timely delivered.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Elegant glasses at a super price
customer_reviews.text: I got two sets of these very pretty glasses! They look very elegant and it's a joy to offer beverages to my guests in them. They also hold up very well in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela I. Bright

customer_reviews.title: Woderdul purchase, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Classy, good looking and can go in dishwasher. Got for a great price just in time for Thanksgiving dinner, Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Unbiased Independent Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Festive!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wine glasses and enjoy using them! Must be hand washed but enjoy using them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Capps

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These turned out very pretty. Make sure and hand wash these!
customer_reviews.author: Macey V.

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant!
customer_reviews.text: A gift I didn't want to let go! Love the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Inger Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! They are sturdy and look beautiful on the table. I've gotten so many compliments on them. Great product and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: fgf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! Will probably order anther set! Great purchase and price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: What modern beautiful cups that add so much to the table decor. LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.author: Tehilla Zohar

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The glass is solid and easy to clean. It holds perfectly in the dishwasher. The cup is well made and study, and feels good to look at. It will be a good plus for the coming holiday season!
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: I fall in love with this set at the first sight
customer_reviews.text: I fall in love with this set at the first sight. I also bought the matching decanter. The whole set looks magnificent! I am very satisfied with the look and the quality. Can’t wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and couldn't be more pleased! Great quality, perfect gold finish and even better in person than in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Cait M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are such a great buy! The gold plates really make them stand out, and they're so much prettier in person. They were packaged really well and they all arrived in perfect condition. Will definitely be using these next time I open up a bottle of wine!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Great package, golden fashioned glasses set for the holiday ...
customer_reviews.text: So impressed! Great package, golden fashioned glasses set for the holiday season! I can't wait to drink my favorite whisky using them. Also great gift for the friends. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: Wish I still liked goldschlager. I would drink it out of this glass.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! These were surprisingly sturdy with gorgeous and safe packaging. I feel like I may have to hand wash but that's most likely better anyways, as my wine glasses tend to break in the dishwasher. I also bought the stemmed wine glasses to match. Truly an adult. Time to invite jay and bey to my dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebap

customer_reviews.title: Okay but a little clunky for my taste
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The gold feels paints on and heavy. Not bad, but not my favorite. On the other hand, my male cousin loved them. So go figure. :)
customer_reviews.author: JLB357

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect on my bar! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice packaging, definitely designed in a way that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging, definitely designed in a way that it could be use as a present. Would be good for Thanksgiving and Christmas decoration and usage because of the gold foiling!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Phan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Bought these and the matching decanter as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: JGriffin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are gorgeous - the outside of the glass is textured on the bottom so that it almost looks like hammered gold, but the inside of the glass is smooth which makes for easier cleaning. You can see in the pics that the gold has a slightly imperfect appearance, as is typical of hand-applied gold leaf, which I find to be a very nice effect. These have a nice weight to them, they fit well in the hand, and they would be a stunning addition to a Christmas/holiday/New Year event. I'm planning to order another set!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 glasses w/o the carafe but definitely thinking of completing the set. Unfortunately I had to take a star because one of the glasses had bubbles in it like previously stated by other reviewers but 1 out of 4 isn't gonna break it.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Berseneva

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and don't feel like they'd break very
customer_reviews.text: Very cute glasses. Good quality and don't feel like they'd break very easily
customer_reviews.author: AAG

customer_reviews.title: Came in the mail shattered
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame I won't be able to use these. They came in mail shattered in tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Drinking Glasses Tumblers Cups 4 Pack, Premium Drinkware Set Gold Plated, Party Gifts
feature_bullets: ★【ALL-PURPOSE】Practical for everyday use. Great for entertaining, our stemless design prevents tipping and spills unlike top-heavy traditional wine glasses. Terrific for dinner, parties, picnics, weddings and to give as gifts. A collection that fuses the natural and modern worlds into elevated pieces for everyday use.
★【SHATTER-RESISTANT】Made of hard and clear glass, that’s resistant to chipping, breakage and shatter. BPA, phthalate, lead, and latex free.
★【100% SATISFACTION】The high quality of both products and service is what we promised. We provide full refund and return!
